_description: Gospel for the First Sunday in Advent in the Northern Homily Cycle

BodAsh42.First Lines:
Saynt marke beginnes his gospellWiþ wordes þat i will
                    ȝow tell…
BodAsh42.Last Lines:
…Of hir a party i will now tellIf þat ȝe will listen
                    to my spell

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Seint Mark bi ginneþ his gospelWiþ wordus þat i wole
                    ȝou tel…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Of hire wol a parti telleȜif ȝe wol lustne to my
                    spelle
BodEngPoeta1.Note:
This MS breaks between 4689 and 6795 twenty-six lines later, ending 4689, ‘Hedde
                    forȝiuenes and mercie’.
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

CULAdd8335.First Lines:
Seynt Marke begynnes his gospelleWith Wordes þat I sale
                    ȝowe tolle…
CULAdd8335.Last Lines:
…When criste come gostly til hire herteOf hire synne rise he
                    hire gerte
CULAdd8335.Attributed Title:
Hic incipiunt euangelia exposita in lingua anglicana a dominica prima
                        aduentus & cetera (p. 3)

CULDd11.First Lines:
SEynt mark beginniþ his gospellewiþ wordis þat I
                    wile ȝow telle…
CULDd11.Last Lines:
…of hire I wile a parti telleif ȝe wile listne to my
                    spelle

CULGg531.First Lines:
Saynt marke bygynnes hys spellWyt wordys þat I sall ȝou
                    tell…
CULGg531.Last Lines:
…Of hyre will I a party tellIf ȝe wyll ly the and styll
                    dwell

BLAdd30358.First Lines:
Saynt mark begynnes þus hys gospellWith wordes þat I sall
                    ȝow tell…
BLAdd30358.Last Lines:
…Yf ȝe will lyth vn to my spellOf hyr apertly wyll I
                    tell

BLAdd38010.First Lines:
Sainte Marke begynnes his gospellWith wordes þat I shall
                    þow tell…
BLAdd38010.Last Lines:
…Iff ȝe will lyth vnto my spellOf hir apertly will I yow
                    tell

BLHar4196.First Lines: SAynt marke bigynnes his godspelleWith wordes þat I sall ȝow telle…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …Sum vnto bale an sum to blisÞan vnto welth oure lorde vs wis
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by Latin, “Sicut scriptum est in ysaya & cetera.”
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): I.148-153.

EDCPCM.First Lines:
[S]Ayn mark byginnes his godspelWit wordes þat I wil you
                    tel…
EDCPCM.Last Lines:
…Of hir wil ik aperti telleYef ye will list and liþe mi
                    spel
EDCPCM.Editions:
Small,  John,
                        ed.  
             English Metrical Homilies….
         Edinburgh: W. Paterson, 1862: 9-20.
Thompson,  Anne B.,
                        ed.  
             The Northern Homily
                    Cycle.
         Kalamazoo, MI: Western Michigan University for TEAMS, 2008.

Lam260.First Lines:
SAynt Mathew bygynnes hys gospellWith wordes I wyll ȝow
                    tell…
Lam260.Last Lines:
…Off hyre I wyll a parti tellYff þat ȝe wyll lysten
                    to my spell
